changeSet.author: kkrumlian
changeSet.sql: update item_data set value = '01/' || '0' || substring(value from '[0-9]') || '/' || substring(value from '[0-9]{4}') where item_data_id IN ( select idx.item_data_id from item_data idx,item i,item_data_type idt where idx.item_id = i.item_id and i.item_data_type_id = idt.item_data_type_id and idt.item_data_type_id = 9 and idx.value ~* '^[0-9]{1}-(JAN|JANUARY)-[0-9]{4}' ); update item_data set value = '01/' || substring(value from '[0-9][0-9]') || '/' || substring(value from '[0-9]{4}') where item_data_id IN ( select idx.item_data_id from item_data idx,item i,item_data_type idt where idx.item_id = i.item_id and i.item_data_type_id = idt.item_data_type_id and idt.item_data_type_id = 9 and idx.value ~* '^[0-9]{2}-(JAN|JANUARY)-[0-9]{4}' ); update item_data set value = '02/' || '0' || substring(value from '[0-9]') || '/' || substring(value from '[0-9]{4}') where item_data_id IN ( select idx.item_data_id from item_data idx,item i,item_data_type idt where idx.item_id = i.item_id and i.item_data_type_id = idt.item_data_type_id and idt.item_data_type_id = 9 and idx.value ~* '^[0-9]{1}-(FEB|FEBRUARY)-[0-9]{4}' );
